meanings.sent1: After fixing the broken lock, she made sure to relock the door tightly.
meanings.sent2: He always double-checks to ensure he is relocking the gate securely.
meanings.sent3: The forgetful squirrel kept relocking the nut in different hiding spots.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like relocking itself after the scary movie.
meanings.sent5: The old chest creaked as if relocking its secrets within.

meanings.sent1: The relocking of the safe was necessary to keep the valuables secure.
meanings.sent2: She heard the loud click of the relocking of the car door.
meanings.sent3: The relocking of the treasure chest seemed like a game to the children.
meanings.sent4: The relocking of the gate echoed through the empty yard.
meanings.sent5: The relocking of the diary felt like sealing away memories.
